text.section: The Commissioner shall be the head of the department. He shall keep his office at the seat of government and devote his entire time to the duties of his office.
The Commissioner may employ necessary personnel to assist in carrying out his duties.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 4, effective March 28, 2002. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 29, effective January 7, 1952. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 26, sec. 6; and ch. 27, sec. 24. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 32, 41, 4618-78, 4618-79.
